APCO-R.BK.summary: Asian Phytoceuticals Public Company Limited engages in the research and development, manufacture, and distribution of health and natural beauty products in Thailand. Its products include dietary supplements, cosmetics, and personal care products that are developed from natural plant and botanical extracts. The company also provides slimming, anti-wrinkle and anti-spots, skin care, and fat reduction products, as well as products for balancing immunity. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Natural Cosmetics Research Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Asian Phytoceuticals Public Company Limited in July 2005. Asian Phytoceuticals Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Lamphun, Thailand.

DDD-R.BK.short_name: DO DAY DREAM PUBLIC COMPANY LIM
DDD-R.BK.long_name: Do Day Dream Public Company Limited
DDD-R.BK.summary: Do Day Dream Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes skin care products and supplements in Thailand. It offers its skin care products under the NAMU LIFE brand name. The company, as an original equipment manufacturer, also manufactures and advices in various kinds of skin care products, including cosmetics, such as creams, serums, gels, sprays, mists, masks, etc. In addition, the company provides management, technical, financial, and enterprise services. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

DDD.BK.short_name: DO DAY DREAM PUBLIC COMPANY LIM

The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

JCT-R.BK.long_name: Jack Chia Industries (Thailand) Public Company Limited
JCT-R.BK.summary: Jack Chia Industries (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, manufactures and distributes pharmaceuticals and toiletries in Thailand. It also offers other consumer products. The company also exports its products. Jack Chia Industries (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1966 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

JCT.BK.long_name: Jack Chia Industries (Thailand) Public Company Limited
JCT.BK.summary: Jack Chia Industries (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, manufactures and distributes pharmaceuticals and toiletries in Thailand. It also offers other consumer products. The company also exports its products. Jack Chia Industries (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1966 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

KAMART-R.BK.summary: Karmarts Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, manufactures and distributes consumer products in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Manufacture and Distribution of Consumer Products; and Warehouse Rental and Warehouse Service. The company offers facial care and cleanser, body care and cleanser, makeup, beauty accessories, hair care, supplement, scented, acne and sensitive skin care, and oral care products under the Cathy Doll, Baby Bright, Boya, Jejuvita, Reunrom, Crayon, Cathy Choo, Skylab, Bergamo, and Keumyon brands. It distributes products through convenience stores; supermarkets/hypermarkets, and discount stores; and specialty stores, as well as through catalogs and online. The company operates 60 shops under the KARMART brand. It also exports its products to Singapore, Cambodia, Vietnam, Myanmar, China, Laos, Indonesia, the Philippines, the United Arab Emirates, Malaysia, Taiwan, the United States, Iraq, Hong Kong, Russia, and India. The company was formerly known as Distar Electric Corporation Public Company Limited and changed its name to Karmarts Public Company Limited in April 2011. Karmarts Public Company Limited was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

MOONG-R.BK.long_name: Moong Pattana International Public Company Limited
MOONG-R.BK.summary: Moong Pattana International Public Company Limited distributes baby and infant products, and other products in Thailand. It operates in two segments, Distribution of Baby and Infant Products; and Distribution of Other Products. The company offers nipple and bottle products, maternity care, skip wipe, health and sanitation products, bath and skin care products, and feed supplements and accessories under pigeon brand name. It provides household products, including Foggy and Smile V spraying bottles, and daily use products such as cotton pads, toothbrushes, and cleansing products under V-Care brand name. Additionally, the company provides Jordan branded dental care products and dental flosses; and food and beverages, including milk tablets, candies, and lollipops, as well as fruit jam. The company was formerly known as Moong Pattana Marketing Company Limited and changed its name to Moong Pattana International Public Company Limited in August 2008. Moong Pattana International Public Company Limited was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

OCC-R.BK.summary: O.C.C. Public Company Limited distributes cosmetics, clothes, musical equipment, and beauty accessories primarily in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Cosmetics Distributing and Beauty Services, Clothes, and Others. It also provides beauty services. In addition, the company distributes cosmetics for face and body; hair care products; and women's wear products, such as lingerie, nightwear, underwear, sport wear, swim wear, and casual wear under the Covermark, Paul & Joe, KMA, Sungrace, Shiseido Professional, BSC Hair Care, Guy Laroche, MAKEUP STUDIO, Limex, and G&G brands. Further, it engages in the haircut service business under the Easy Cut brand. The company distributes its products through department stores, beauty centers, and beauty salons. O.C.C. Public Company Limited was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SCM-R.BK.summary: Successmore Being Public Company Limited operates as a network marketing company. The company operates through Multi-Level Marketing, Distributor Sales, and Rendering Services segments. It is involved in the research, development, manufacture, and distribution of dietary supplements, cosmetics, skin care products, lifestyle products, home products, and plant supplement products. The company also arranges seminars; and provides render services for staff training. Successmore Being Public Company Limited was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TNR-R.BK.long_name: Thai Nippon Rubber Industry Public Co., Ltd.
TNR-R.BK.summary: Thai Nippon Rubber Industry Public Co., Ltd. manufactures and distributes condoms and lubricating gels under the Onetouch brand in Thailand. It also manufactures paper packaging products. The company sells its products through retailers and distributors. It sells its products in approximately 100 countries, including Europe, Africa, the United States, the Middle East, and internationally. Thai Nippon Rubber Industry Public Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
